system.descriptionText: +3 Willpower. Gain Literacy, Speak Language (High Gothic), Common Lore (Imperial Creed), Common Lore (Imperium) and Common Lore (War) as untrained Basic Skills. Suffer -5 to Forbidden Lore Tests.
